text:
SPECIFICATION CHANGE.
PROPOSAL NO. 88-96

BRAND(S) KENT SPECIAL MILD KS CHAR (JAPAN)
|
|

DOMESTIC __ EXPORT X_ U.S. CAUTION NOTICE OTHER _

—_—

DESCRIPTION OF CHANGE:

This establishes cigarette and packaging specs for a new brand,

KENT SPECIAL MILD KS CHAR (JAPAN), Brand Code 1508, Product Code 5346
for Japan. Cigarette specs are identical to KENT MILDS KS CHAR (JAPAN)
except they use longer (30 mm) tipping.

_

EFFECT ON COST:

New brand.

—_—

REQUESTED IMPLEMENTATION DATE AND/OR CONDITIONS:

Production scheduled for June, 1988.

 

DATE: 5/2/88

  

 

 

x
x

 

 

 

Metg.
eee
‘APPROVAL: President
3460

623030940

summary: Cigarette specs are identical to KENT MILDS KS CHAR (JAPAN) except they use longer (30 mm) tipping. Production scheduled for June, 1988. Brand Code 1508, Product Code 5346 for Japan. U.S. exports to Japan will not be affected by this change.
